title: NTextareaProps
description: Props for the NTextarea component. A multi-line text input area for longer form content such as descriptions and comments.

placeholder.description: Placeholder text shown when the textarea is empty

value.description: The current text value of the textarea

disabled.description: Whether the textarea is disabled and non-interactive

invalid.description: Whether the textarea is in an invalid/error state

className.description: Additional CSS class names for custom styling
